content: मौलि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मूलस्यादूरभवः इञ्] Head, foremost, best; अखिलपरिमलानां मौलिना सौरभेण <ls>Bv. 1. 121.</ls> --लिः {@--1@} The head, the crown of the head; मौलौ वा रचयांजलिं <ls>Ve. 3. 40</ls>; <ls>R. 13. 59</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 79.</ls> {@--2@} The head or top of anything, top-most point; <ls>U. 2. 30.</ls> {@--3@} The Aśoka tree. --लिः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} A crown, diadem, tiara; <ls>Bv. 1. 73.</ls> {@--2@} Hair on the crown of the head, tuft or lock of hair; जटामौलि <ls>Ku. 2. 26</ls> (जटाजूट <ls>Malli.</ls>). {@--3@} Braided hair, hair braided and ornamented; <ls>Ve. 6. 34</ls>; --लिः, --ली {%<ab>f.</ab>%} The earth.
